Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 54th overall pick, by Houston in 1979...
Injured on 4/2/1979 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 8 weeks...
Injured on 5/18/1981 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/18/1982...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/21/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Traded from Texas to California on 7/7/1992 (Going to TEX: C G. Zaun, P L. Demery. Going to CAL: P D. Henry, P D. Eckersley, P L. Leal)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/3/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Traded from New York (N) to San Francisco on 2/20/1994 (Going to SF: P L. Leal, P T. Worrell. Going to NYM: P G. Gohr)...
